title: Very Good.
comment: It may needs some tweaks here and there on the GUI side, and a black theme would be awesome, but overall it's a very good Transmission Remote GUI. Probably the best of the free one's.

title: Good UI but magnet links not working
comment: The look and usability of the UI is perfect, but the app won't properly add magnet links...
Does what it says it does
Works as advertised although it should be possible to sort torrents by queue position.

title: Great app
comment: But one of the last updates broke magnet torrent adding. Please fix :)

title: Good app,  but buggy for more than 2 months
comment: From the beginning I cannot change the target ratio of added torrents. By selecting the option,  the app switches it on and off forever without letting me change anything

title: Amazing app, needs UI tweaks
comment: Works perfectly, and it looks fantastic. However, for each torrent, the bounding area doesn't have a fixed height, and instead expands to fit its text. This causes the torrent list to constantly be jumbled around as the DL/UL speeds gain and lose digits, making the torrent areas change in size. Please change this!
Did not even work for me

title: Good but issue
comment: Great features; best transmission client available. But when I want to change the torrent limits, the dropdown selection boxes start switching between the old and new value,  making it impossible to change the values.

title: Great app!
comment: Keep the updates coming! ;)

title: Удобно и локанично
comment: На мой взгляд наиболее удобный из transmission клиентов

title: Not working like before
comment: Problems adding random torrents from private trackers...I'm back to using two apps for my downloading...torrnado for adding torrents and gear shift for managing downloads..

Selecting and deleting torrents works for me. Try getting a logcat output after enabling debug and posting it in g+. Without a crash report or a way to reproduce this, i can't do anything. Also, v0.9.17 doesn't have any 'Search' feature.

title: Excellent app
comment: This app works great and looks great. (using it on my Nexus 10 and HTC One)
new version throws access denied messages randomly after hitting refresh its ok. when i tap a torrent to get the details it also gives the same.  previous version was perfect. great app.

title: Good at first but
comment: If you have a lot of torrents(2000) very slow, good interference i have to admit. Fix it if you want 5 stars.

title: Good but...
comment: Loses connection in background, have to kill restart to get sync back. Else brilliant app. !

title: Great
comment: Just what I was looking for great interface and nicely laid out

title: Functional and Free
comment: Really well-executed! Has a great Holo interface and works exactly as you'd expect. Plus, it's ad-free. This is the one, folks.

title: Every refresh causes the  list to jump
comment: As mentioned in the title, every refresh causes the torrent list to bounce downwards as though it were a manual swipe refresh. Otherwise a great app.  Bug: Above problem only happens if you change the original RPC path to something else such as "/Transmission/rpc". I have two clients with different RPC paths. Would be nice if you could correct this issue.
Hi, could you post in the g+ group exactly when this list bounce occurs, if it only occurs under certain conditions.

title: Brilliant
comment: Wonderful UI, complete features, thanks !

title: Best Transmission remote on the market.
comment: Loading time is pretty slow, and I'd like to see a widget (multiple size options please). As it is, it's still the best by a long shot. Excellent work!
SUPERB!
Very good!
Great work!
Best Transmission app by far, great work!

title: I use Duckdns when out of the house. Does not work
comment: Love the app, but it does not allow me to access transmission when using Duckdns. I can access transmission through Duckdns using chrome, but not gear shift. This is a deal breaker. Tried on Samsung s4 and nexus 7

title: Awesome.
comment: Great design, works perfect. Must have.

title: Just awesome
comment: I love the interface, it's so functional and gives the right amount of control one needs on a regular basis.

title: Awesome app
comment: It'd be nice to select the destination folder rather than having to enter the path. Other than that, awesome app!

title: Quick easy and full of features
Excellent clean app
comment: Very nice.  One of those rare apps I can't think of much to improve upon.

title: The best I've ever tried.
comment: Now the only thing I'm missing is the ability to change the priority of a torrent (not the individual files of a torrent). But still, it's worth five starts -- I love the UI specifically! OK, my mistake, the option for changing the priority of a torrent is there though not so easy to access

title: Fantastic!碉堡了！
comment: The UI design is very cool. Will be better if peer connection lists are provided. UI设计大赞。有peer连接列表就更好了。

title: Amazing. Perfect. Solves my problems!
comment: The best transmission GUI I have ever used.

title: Great app
comment: Very well made application. Only thing i couldn't figure out was how to add torrent from within the application.
As of 0.9.48, you can add magnet links (or torrent files if you are running android 4.4) from the app.

title: Beautiful and intuitively functional..
comment: A great app, and does exactly what it advertises, with minimal hassle and fuss. Very well designed, and a pleasure to use. Working perfectly on 4.4 and has made my life so much easier. One of the best remote transmission apps I've used so far.

"After updating to Android KitKat 4.4, trying to add torrents via the add torrent file option is causing it to Force Close. It might be a Kit Kat issue though because magnet links are working fine."

Nah, that was a bug I introduced in 0.9.30, and then fixed in 0.9.36.

title: dardy
comment: much better than remote transmission

title: Wow
comment: Really nice work.

title: Ridiculously good.
comment: Perfect for my set up with a raspberry Pi, this app is insanely good at what it does and looks excellent at the same time. The only possible thing I could want added would be the ability to copy and paste in a URL of a magnet link instead of having to only use a hyperlink - for difficult situations.

title: Perfect
comment: Miles better the the official remote transmission app. Well done guys.

title: The best!
comment: The most featured and well polished Android Transmission client I have ever seen!

title: Best Transmission Remote App
comment: Has every option one would need and is extremely user-friendly and very pleasant to use. I only wish it intercepted .torrent links instead of just magnet links.

title: Best Transmisson client (including PC versions)
comment: I have used various Transmission clients and this is the most user friendly. Easy to add , view and manage torrents. I no longer use my PC for Transmission, just link direct to my NAS using this. Just keeps getting better.

title: Wow
comment: The interface of this app is a pleasure to use. Both good I looking and powerful. Uninstalled the old transmission remote app I was using and will be using Gear Shift from now on!
The best there is.

title: Tried many clients...
comment: This is by far the best transmission GUI on the market.  Needs a pro version so you can get paid and avoid ever adding resorting to ads.
Excellent! Works great!

title: The best transmission client ever!
comment: This is the best Transmission client I ever used. Its strength is the torrent location management. Moving torrent's location is a breeze.

title: Excellent
comment: Tried various other android clients and this was the best by quite a wide margin.

title: So far, so great
comment: Very nice!  Thanks.

title: Bloody excellent
comment: Beautiful UI easy to set up and works flawlessly. Only downside is the icon.

title: gj better than remote transmision clients
comment: easy, clear, and no bugs up to now, a pretty nice app (even if its the first u made in android)

title: Love It!
comment: A very fluid, smooth, and modern android app great to see it using the latest styles so it works well with jelly bean.

title: Awesome
comment: Really awesome ui

title: Top notch
comment: Looks great and works even better. I uninstalled my other transmission client immediately.

title: Great app!
comment: Probably the best Transmission client out there and it's provided for free. Seems too good to be true but it really is a great app.

title: Very good
comment: Probably the only transmission client for android which really does everything the right way.

Hi,

Could you check if 0.9.12 fixes the problems with transmission 2.20?

title: Awesome
comment: Having tried quite a few transmission front ends, some that worked easily and others that just stopped, this is easily the most intuitive and best looking one there is. Kudos to the dev for making it free and ad free. I would happily pay for this app.

title: The best!
comment: I have been using TransGUI (paid version) for over a year now but changed to this as it is perfect! Don't bother trying any other Transmission remote app. Works flawlessly with my Openelec HTPC, on my A500 and S2.

title: Does what it says on the tin
comment: Unlike others, it does it well..

title: Best yet
comment: Best remote transmission client I have used to date.

title: Perfect
comment: A better Transmission client in the play store

title: Okay app, excellent font!
comment: If there was a donate version, I'd buy it
